text: khdh -ayha alnby- min 'amwal hwla' alttayibin aladhin khalatuu eamalana salihana wakhar sayiyana sadaqatan tutahiruhum min dns dhnwbhm, wtrfehm ean manazil almunafiqin 'iilaa manazil almkhlsyn, wade lahum bialmaghfirat lidhunubihim wastaghfar lahum mnha, 'iina dea'k wastghfark rahmatan watum'aninat lhm. wallah samie likuli duea' wqwl, ealim bahwal aleabbad wnyathm, wsyjazy kll eamil bemlh
